text: Gerrit Patist (1947 – 2005, in De Bilt) was a Dutch sculptor and ceramist.Biographical data at the Netherlands Institute for Art History. Patist had produced many works of art, mostly sculptures and ceramics, but he had worked with brush and ink. He died at age 68 from leukemia. == See also == * List of Dutch ceramists == References == Category:1947 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Dutch ceramists Category:People from Leiderdorp Category:20th- century ceramists
title: Gerrit Patist
